column6: Lines are drawn and secrets are revealed as the darkly intense Secret Avengers/Young Allies event continues! With Onslaught and Nomad inextricably intertwined and the stakes growing ever greater, Steve Rogers finds himself forced to make an impossible decision!
column8: | penciller:Filipe Daniel Moreno De Andrade | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller (cover):Humberto Ramos | editor:Lauren Sankovitch
